name: JanKen (Rock-Paper-Scissors)
description:
"Janken," is a rock-paper-scissors game where you'll be competing against a VRoid model to see if you can win the set!

The game is easy to play: each set consists of three rounds, and the first player to win two rounds wins the set. You can select your move by simply clicking on one of the three options: "Rock," "Paper," or "Scissors." But be quick - the timer is ticking, and you need to choose your move before time runs out!

Currently, the game features one VRoid model that you'll be facing off against. The model has a variety of animations and personalities, including idle animations, move animations, and win/lose animations.

"Janken" is still in its prototype stage, but I plan to add more characters and features to the game! 

Thanks for playing!

「Janken」は、自分が作ったVRoidモデルと対戦するジャンケンゲームです。セットごとに3回の勝負が行われ、2回勝利すればセットを制します。

グー・チョキ・パーのアイコンのどれか1つを時間以内にクリックするだけで簡単にプレイできます！

現在は1体のVRoidモデルが登場します。

「Janken」はまだプロトタイプ段階ですが、今後もさまざまなキャラクターや機能を追加する予定です。プレイしていただきありがとうございます！
